General.Name: Suzhou Institute of Building Science Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Institute of Building Science Group Co.,Ltd operates in the construction industry in China. The company offers engineering technical services, including foundations, building materials, and construction workers; professional construction comprising urban renewal and building waterproofing; structural reinforcement, renovation of old communities, addition of elevators, smart cities, and other businesses; architectural design; engineering supervision; and other technical services, such as building energy conservation, training schools, engineering consulting, etc. It also provides testing, inspection, monitoring, identification, training, and other technical services for building materials, civil air defense engineering, special equipment, building energy conservation and green building, judicial appraisal, Highway, water transportation, and other aspects of business; carbon neutral solutions; waterproofing material and coating; waterproof insulation; and educational and training services. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Suzhou, China.
